title: Gamification-Based Managerial Leadership Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Educational Theories and Classroom Management Experience
context.additional_context: Enhances managerial competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers through gamification activities based on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can appropriately apply three or more conflict-resolution strategies in gamified environments based on situational contexts.
Learners can evaluate and improve their leadership style two or more times using a digital feedback system.
Learners can successfully complete one or more classroom management simulations utilizing competitive and cooperative game elements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
